lines.text: This is our saddest case, a result of too many raisins.
Scott, do you want to see me go to jail for bigamy, or t-t-trigamy?
Are all these home brew bugs women?

[bottle reads take 1 pill every 2 days]
How many pills did you take?
Even if I have to be married and divorced three times, you'll wait for me, won't you dear?
You can save me, let's run away and be married.

[making home brew]
You know how it is, do I have enough raisins in here?

[stutters, takes a drink]
Will you marry me?
Yes? Then let's fade out without the usual cliches.
